overview: You see, it's like this...I've always has an obsession with butts! Maybe it's because my name is Seymore Butts, and I come from a long line of Butts. Or, maybe it's because there's nothing better then a butt. Or, maybe it's more fun to watch a pretty girl walking away from me because they can't see me drooling. Yeah, I drool, and my dick gets hard, and I play with myself. And now, I going to give you the chance to drool, and to get hard, and to play with yourself...Because I found a video camera and I'm going to take you on an adventure in Buttland!
title: The Adventures of Seymore Butts
